trans-unit.resname: AVR·1 | Angel of Glory's Rise | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 耀扬天使

trans-unit.resname: AVR·1 | Angel of Glory's Rise | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile all Zombies, then return all Human creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐所有灵俑，然后将所有人类生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AVR·1 | Angel of Glory's Rise | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Justice isn't done until undeath is undone."
trans-unit.target: 「亡物必得复死，正义才得彰显。」

trans-unit.resname: AVR·2 | Angel of Jubilation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel of Jubilation
trans-unit.target: 欢庆天使

trans-unit.resname: AVR·2 | Angel of Jubilation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nOther nonblack creatures you control get +1/+1.\nPlayers can't pay life or sacrifice creatures to cast spells or activate abilities.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 由你操控的其他非黑色生物得+1/+1。 牌手不能以支付生命或牺牲生物的方式施放咒语或起动异能。

trans-unit.resname: AVR·2 | Angel of Jubilation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Though Innistrad is not cleansed of evil, we finally have cause to rejoice."
trans-unit.target: 「依尼翠的邪恶虽未尽除，但我们终于有欢庆的理由。」

trans-unit.source: Angel's Mercy
trans-unit.target: 天使的慈悲

trans-unit.resname: AVR·3 | Angel's Mercy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 7 life.
trans-unit.target: 你获得7点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I understand your fears. I pity your doubts. I absolve you of both."
trans-unit.target: 「我了解你的恐惧。 我怜悯你的疑虑。 我让你免除此等困扰。」

trans-unit.source: Angelic Wall
trans-unit.target: 天使圣墙

trans-unit.source: Defender, flying
trans-unit.target: 守军，飞行

trans-unit.source: "The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside."\n—Tales of Ikarov the Voyager
trans-unit.target: 「风仿佛因天使羽翼扬起，将敌人扫向一旁。」 ～旅人伊卡罗夫的故事

trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance

trans-unit.target: 披甲炽天使长啸响彻云霄，黑暗只得暂退。

trans-unit.resname: AVR·6 | Avacyn, Angel of Hope | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
trans-unit.target: 希望天使艾维欣

trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒 CARDNAME与其他由你操控的永久物不会毁坏。

trans-unit.resname: AVR·6 | Avacyn, Angel of Hope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.
trans-unit.target: 金色螺旋自狱窖疾升入空。 巨大银体在惊雷爆炸中碎裂，艾维欣终于自牢狱中脱困。

trans-unit.target: 驱逐一击

trans-unit.source: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.\nMiracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器，生物，或结界置于其拥有者的牌库底。 奇迹{W} （当你抓此牌时，如果它是你于本回合抓的第一张牌，你可以支付其奇迹费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.target: 「灰泥须以神圣守护加持，否则街道必将染血。」 ～瑟班石艺师瓦洼

trans-unit.target: 结附于非黑色生物 所结附的生物得+1/+2，具有飞行异能，且额外具有天使此类别。

trans-unit.resname: AVR·9 | Call to Serve | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Grace is a gift, never a reward.

trans-unit.source: Avacyn's holy warriors kept hope alive in her darkest hours. Now they will carry that hope across Innistrad.
trans-unit.target: 艾维欣的圣战士在她最艰困的时刻依旧维系着希望。 现在他们将把这份希望传遍依尼翠。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Evil will soon be vanquished. What Innistrad most needs now is healing."
trans-unit.target: 「邪恶即将溃败。 现在依尼翠最需要疗愈。」

trans-unit.target: 放逐目标由你操控的生物，然后将该牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: "Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn."\n—Elder Rimheit
trans-unit.target: 「连暴风云都向艾维欣俯首敬拜。」 ～长老琳海

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 1/1 white Human creature token onto the battlefield."

trans-unit.source: "Wear her symbol with honor, a sign of faith upheld and honest deeds bravely done."
trans-unit.target: 「光荣地佩戴她的标记，这是信念坚定不移与英勇奉行正道的象征。」

trans-unit.source: No longer the village pariah. No longer taunted and shamed. Sigrun was finally free.
trans-unit.target: 不再是乡村贱民。 不再遭羞辱嘲骂。 希格兰终获自由。

trans-unit.source: Gisela cornered the murderous demon among the graves of the dead villagers. "A fitting end," she murmured as she raised her sword.

trans-unit.source: "By Avacyn's decree, we shall cleanse these relics of their demonic past."

trans-unit.resname: AVR·40 | Voice of the Provinces | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her horn is heard across Innistrad, lifting the hearts of the righteous.

trans-unit.target: 狂热重击

trans-unit.source: "Cower, fiend. The night is yours no longer."

trans-unit.source: Side effects may include foul odors, scalding steam, and spontaneous nonexistence.
trans-unit.target: 副作用可能包括恶臭、炙热蒸气和自行消失。

trans-unit.target: 积聚配方

trans-unit.resname: AVR·43 | Amass the Components | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌，然后将一张牌从你手上置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: AVR·43 | Amass the Components | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I knew I'd find a use for all that newt spittle!"
trans-unit.target: 「我就知道那些蝾螈唾液会有用处！」

trans-unit.target: 神秘搏战

trans-unit.source: Debates between wizards are never purely academic.

trans-unit.resname: AVR·45 | Captain of the Mists | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Captain of the Mists
trans-unit.target: 迷雾船长

trans-unit.resname: AVR·45 | Captain of the Mists | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, untap CARDNAME.\n{1}{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个人类在你的操控下进战场时，重置CARDNAME。 {1}{U}，{T}：你可以横置或重置目标永久物。

trans-unit.resname: AVR·45 | Captain of the Mists | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am no mere ship's captain. The north wind is my accomplice. The tide is my first mate."
trans-unit.target: 「我不仅是船长。 北风是我的帮手； 潮汐是我的大副。」

trans-unit.target: 致残冰寒

trans-unit.target: 游魂吹一口气，能使血管结为冰河，心跳旋即冻结。

trans-unit.target: 魂系 （你可以将此生物与另一未搭档生物在它们任一进战场时组搭档。 只要你操控它们，此两者便持续搭档。） 只要CARDNAME与另一生物搭档，它们便各具有「{1}{U}：放逐此生物，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场。」

(They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 魂系 （你可以将此生物与另一未搭档生物在它们任一进战场时组搭档。 只要你操控它们，此两者便持续搭档。） 只要CARDNAME与另一生物搭档，此两者便具有辟邪异能。 （它们不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.target: 这是少年法师所学的第一个咒语，救过许多手小到握不住剑的人。

trans-unit.target: 魂系 （你可以将此生物与另一未搭档生物在它们任一进战场时组搭档。 只要你操控它们，此两者便持续搭档。） 只要CARDNAME与另一生物搭档，它们便各具有「{2}{U}：重置此生物。」

Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 辟邪 （此生物不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。） 每当CARDNAME对一位牌手造成战斗伤害时，若你并未操控其他生物，则检视你牌库顶的四张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.target: 毁弃仪式

trans-unit.resname: AVR·153 | Rite of Ruin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose an order for artifacts, creatures, and lands. Each player sacrifices one permanent of the first type, sacrifices two of the second type, then sacrifices three of the third type.
trans-unit.target: 为神器、生物与地这三个类别选择顺序。 每位牌手各牺牲一个第一种类别的永久物，两个第二种类别的，然后三个第三种类别的。

trans-unit.resname: AVR·153 | Rite of Ruin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Skirsdag cultists refused to quietly accept Avacyn's ascendancy.
trans-unit.target: 史革达教徒拒绝默默接受艾维欣掌权的现况。

trans-unit.resname: AVR·154 | Rush of Blood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rush of Blood
trans-unit.target: 血欲袭击

trans-unit.resname: AVR·154 | Rush of Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为其力量。

trans-unit.resname: AVR·154 | Rush of Blood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes it's not for sustenance or to feed the dependence. Sometimes it's just to feel again.
trans-unit.target: 有时这不是为了维持生命或解决瘾头。 有时这只是为了再度感觉。

trans-unit.target: 灼烫魔鬼

trans-unit.source: {2}{R}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target player.

trans-unit.source: Demons massacre. Devils annoy.
trans-unit.target: 恶魔大屠杀。 魔鬼惹人厌。

trans-unit.target: 松柏森警卫

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME被一个生物阻挡时，CARDNAME对该生物造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: He has nothing left but his resentment.
trans-unit.target: 他失去一切，只剩愤慨。

They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)\nAs long as CARDNAME is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
trans-unit.target: 魂系 （你可以将此生物与另一未搭档生物在它们任一进战场时组搭档。 只要你操控它们，此两者便持续搭档。） 只要CARDNAME与另一生物搭档，它们便各具有「{R}：此生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。」

trans-unit.source: The dark times left the peasantry ready to fight with whatever weapons were at hand.

trans-unit.target: 选择一项～CARDNAME对目标牌手造成3点伤害；或电击对目标具飞行异能的生物造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "My next aerial design will use less metal."\n—Hadaken, alchemist of Nephalia
trans-unit.target: 「我的下一个飞空设计会少用点金属。」 ～涅非利亚炼金术士哈靼肯

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成5点伤害。 奇迹{R} （当你抓此牌时，如果它是你于本回合抓的第一张牌，你可以支付其奇迹费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.source: +1: Draw a card, then discard a card at random.\n-4: CARDNAME deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.\n-6: Gain control of all creatures until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: +1：抓一张牌，然后随机弃一张牌。 -4：CARDNAME对目标牌手造成等同于其手牌数量的伤害。 -6：获得所有生物的操控权直到回合结束。 将它们重置。 它们获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 走调暴君

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手随机选择由他操控的一个永久物并牺牲之。 若以此法牺牲一个非地永久物，重复此流程。

trans-unit.source: "To survive, we must embrace the savagery we knew in our race's infancy."\n—Edgar Markov
trans-unit.target: 「为了生存，我们必须接受后辈的残暴特质。」 ～艾德嘉马可夫

trans-unit.source: It's not any fun until someone loses an eye.

trans-unit.target: 保安正义

trans-unit.source: It begins as a whisper and ends with the red roar of fire.

trans-unit.source: "There's only one route from Kessig into Stensia. Unless you come with me."

trans-unit.target: 在最黑暗的时刻，有些人拒斥艾维欣。 现在凯锡革荒野是他们唯一的避难所。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card that shares a creature type with a creature you control, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put that card on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，展示你的牌库顶牌。 若该牌为生物牌，且与由你操控的一个生物有共通的生物类别，则你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。若否，将该牌置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.target: 「我们追着卢德维的怪物跑遍四省。当它着陆时，一定要把它留在原地。」 ～凯锡革布陷人阿雷娜告诉 沃文森的荷拉娜

trans-unit.target: 长嚎游魂

trans-unit.target: 力量小于CARDNAME的生物不能阻挡它。 不息 （当此生物死去时，若其上没有+1/+1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回战场，且其上有一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's paired with a creature, that creature also gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

trans-unit.target: 「我令所行，狼人将成卫狼，是为对抗暗黑的盟友。」 ～艾维欣的息怨咒判令

trans-unit.target: 荨麻原野猪

trans-unit.source: When the forests became havens for evil, the archmages devised new ways to cleanse the wilds.
trans-unit.target: 随着树林成为邪物的避难所，大法师有了净化荒野的新方法。

trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature gets +6/+6 and gains trample, and all creatures able to block it this turn do so.\nMiracle {G} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

trans-unit.resname: AVR·226 | Cavern of Souls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\n{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一个生物类别。 {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。 此法术力只能用来施放该类别的生物咒语，且该咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.source: Desolate Lighthouse
trans-unit.target: 荒芜灯塔

trans-unit.resname: AVR·227 | Desolate Lighthouse | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}{U}{R}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}{U}{R}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: A lonely sentinel facing gales, hurricanes, and tides of homicidal spirits.
trans-unit.target: 面对强风、飓风与嗜杀鬼魂浪潮的孤独哨兵。

trans-unit.source: Seraph Sanctuary
trans-unit.target: 炽天使圣殿

trans-unit.resname: AVR·228 | Seraph Sanctuary | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.\nWhenever an Angel enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.\n{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得1点生命。 每当一个天使在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。 {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance and haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {R}{W}，{T}：直到回合结束，目标生物得+2/+0且获得警戒与敏捷异能。

trans-unit.source: Its courtyards are lit during every hour of the day so that night may never fall within its walls.
trans-unit.target: 其庭院一整天都点着灯，因此夜晚在其围墙内永不会来临。
